brainNote.title: Brainstorming is a byproduct of poor note-taking

outboundReferenceNotes.title: Use Writing as a tool for learning

childMdx.excerpt: Everything in life revolves around writing. Whether it be studying, research, academia, expression-- writing is used. In order to better…
This idea came from  Andy Matuschak's notes about writing notes .  Notes should act as a single unit of thought that can still be understood…
